page_content: The page contains archived police media releases for October 2012, including various PDFs related to incidents.
The page reports on the theft of wooden signs and animal figures in Dulliken, with a reward offered for information.
The page discusses proposed regulations for evaluating electronic data from asylum seekers for identification and deportation procedures.
The page provides detailed results of political initiatives and elections held on November 28, 2010, in the Canton of Solothurn.
The page provides information on how to reserve vehicle inspection appointments online, specifically for garage partners. It includes a PDF guide for the process.
The page discusses the Canton of Solothurn's rejection of proposed federal regulations concerning social assistance for third-country nationals.
The page provides information on family support services, including legal and personal advice, offered by Pro Familia Schweiz.
